name: despitefully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an old word for
spitefully : in a way that shows you want to annoy, upset, or hurt another person, because you feel angry towards them: God told us to do good to those who do evil, and to pray for those who despitefully persecute us. The invading army treated them despitefully.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is intolerable to be insulted and despitefully used in this way.Those who despitefully use us must be evil men. I would never do that wilfully or despitefully.
